Explanation

In Module / Separate Module for Integration Test

We distinguish between a so called in Module integration tests and separated module integration tests. The in module means to have the integration tests within the same module which contains the unit tests. This approach is usually used if you a only a single module.

Unit Tests

Using classes from an other module within the current unit tests. Execution of unit tests within a test-jar.jar file (currently not supported by surefire plugin).
